Package DAO

Class CustomerQueries

java.lang.Object
DAO.CustomerQueries
public class CustomerQueries extends Object
Data access class that holds all database query methods pertaining to the Customer class.

  • Method Details

    • insertCustomer

      public static int insertCustomer(String name, String address, String postalCode, String phone, String createdBy, String lastUpdatedBy, int divId)
      Method that takes customer information and inserts into customer table in database.
      Parameters:
      name - Customer name String used in INSERT INTO query.
      address - Customer address String used in INSERT INTO query.
      postalCode - Customer postal code String used in INSERT INTO query.
      phone - Customer phone number as a String used in INSERT INTO query.
      createdBy - User who is inserting customer, as a String, used in INSERT INTO query.
      lastUpdatedBy - User who is inserting customer, as a String, used in INSERT INTO query.
      divId - Customer's corresponding first-level division ID used to determine both country and state/province names.
      Returns:
      Returns 1 if query is successful, otherwise return 0.

    • updateCustomer

      public static int updateCustomer(int cusId, String name, String address, String postalCode, String phone, String lastUpdatedBy, int divId) throws SQLException
      Method that updates a given customer from database's customer table.
      Parameters:
      cusId - Customer ID used to identify customer data to be queried.
      name - Customer name String used in UPDATE query.
      address - Custer address String used in UPDATE query.
      postalCode - Customer postal code String used in UPDATE query.
      phone - Customer phone number as a String used in UPDATE query.
      lastUpdatedBy - User who is updating customer, as a String, used in UPDATE query.
      divId - Customer's corresponding first-level division ID, as an int, used in UPDATE query.
      Returns:
      Returns 1 if query is successful, otherwise returns 0.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • selectAllCustomers

      public static ResultSet selectAllCustomers() throws SQLException
      Method that queries the database to select all from the customers table.
      Returns:
      Returns the ResultSet from selecting all customers query.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • selectCustomer

      public static ResultSet selectCustomer(String name, String address) throws SQLException
      Overloaded method that queries the database to select a particular customer by name and address from database's customers table.
      Parameters:
      name - Customer name String used in SELECT query.
      address - Customer address String used in SELECT query.
      Returns:
      Returns the ResultSet from selecting given customer query.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • selectCustomer

      public static ResultSet selectCustomer(int id) throws SQLException
      Overloaded method that queries the database to select a particular customer by customer ID from database's customers table.
      Parameters:
      id - Customer ID int used in SELECT query.
      Returns:
      Returns the ResultSet from selecting given customer query.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • deleteCustomer

      public static int deleteCustomer(int id) throws SQLException
      Method that queries the database to delete a customer with a given ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - Customer ID int used in DELETE FROM query.
      Returns:
      Returns the ResultSet from executing delete query for particular customer.
      Throws:
      SQLException
